Name: Windows - Local User
Description: Configures a local user. (If assigning user rights the ntrights.exe file should be installed on the target server and added to the system path variable)
Author: sportingsolutions

Parameters.Name: MemberOf
Parameters.Label: Group memberships
Parameters.HelpText: A comma separated list of group memberships

Parameters.Name: UserRights
Parameters.Label: User rights
Parameters.HelpText: A comma separated list of user rights to assign (e.g. SeServiceLogonRight). See http://support.microsoft.com/kb/315276 for full list of rights
